title: Bard on Howling Abyss
body:
Will he also get  Chimes on the map?

(Edit) Also chimes on Twisted Tree Line?

How will they spawn?

replies.body: Yes, Chimes will spawn on any map. As with SR they'll spawn semi randomly, with some tailoring of how based off the map in question.
What about his move skill E?  That seems pretty worthless on HA.
There are some places where you can use it to surf along the side of the walls. It's situational (best when chasing after a team fight), but not useless.
